# The `RunAsTask` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Constructs an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executorprocesscontrol/incomingwfrhandler">IncomingWFRHandler</a> from a function object by creating a new function object that dispatches the original using a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/taskdispatcher">TaskDispatcher</a>, wrapping the original as a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/genericnamedtask">GenericNamedTask</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Constructs an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executorprocesscontrol/incomingwfrhandler">IncomingWFRHandler</a> from a function object by creating a new function object that dispatches the original using a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/taskdispatcher">TaskDispatcher</a>, wrapping the original as a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/genericnamedtask">GenericNamedTask</a>.

This is the default approach for running WFR handlers.

Definition at line 81 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/executorprocesscontrol-h">ExecutorProcessControl.h</a>.
